attributes.action:
The Govt’s Chequers White Paper simply
IS NOT BREXIT.
IT MUST BE SCRAPPED NOW!
attributes.background:
The Government’s Chequers White Paper on Brexit simply is not Brexit.
We the people demand that it be scrapped now!

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220073
